otherNames: Hakuoki ~Demon of the Fleeting Blossom~ Dawn of the Shinsengumi, 薄桜鬼 黎明録
synopsis: The third season of Hakuouki continues this TV anime based on a series of bishounen games released by Idea Factory for the PlayStation 2 and PSP. This new anime tells the story of the dawning of the shinsengumi.
